name: BIBIX
description:
A classic Rubik's cube experience

Play with a Rubik's cube.

Experiment with it.

Train yourself.

Solve it!

note: WebGL default window might be too small to show some user interface elements, consider using fullscreen mode.

Features
  • Colors
Change the color of the faces and background to best fit your visual needs or just to set a nice mood.  

  • Shapes
Add shapes and contrast to the faces for a greater challenge or to improve readability for visually impaired people.
  • Save
Some puzzles may take days to solve while learning, for that reason bibix allows you to save your hard work to continue later.
  • Controls
Playable with a mouse or a gamepad.
